con:testCase.name: Pain001_Camt055_Message REJC
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create PAIN002 Cancel message at

con:config.con:query: select CUSTOMERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='${Properties#bankId}' and length(customerID)='11' and ROWNUM=1

con:config.con:query: SELECT TRANSACTIONSID , ENDTOENDID , PAYMENTTYPE, PAYMENTSTATUS, ISPC , FK_PROCESSINGLINEID FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE ENDTOENDID LIKE '%${Properties#msgID}%'
